Reviews.Content: visited sydney friends wedding looking centrally located walking distance shops restaurants public transport self contained property ticked boxes staff friendly ensure enjoyable stay pointers visit unfamiliar sydney modern clean street noise expecting city returning

Reviews.Title: “Sleepless in Sydney”
Reviews.Author: SS_Aussie
Reviews.Content: budget accommodation worth extra 50 night stay decent horribly noisy despite quieter mean constantly noisy road sounds windows theyre fine plenty space decent bed kitchen etc cleanliness poor someones hairs bathroom unpleasant location kings cross ultimately dodgy hole experience cost cheap mean probably pay wouldnt allow company poor staff nice little restaurants etc dont

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff and good value!”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 weeks courteous friendly staff welcomed feel comfortable apartment clean appointed apartments situated close kings cross noise night bad described reviews travelled 15 month daughter apartment specifically designed children management provided quality travel cot flat studio type flat quiet daughter gone bed tv kept low volume heartily recommend

Reviews.Title: “Lovely room, friendly service, great value - just ask for earplugs”
